name: SetVariablesWithCredentials
description: Sets variables with a user name and/or password stored in a connected service credential. Only Generic Service endpoints are supported
author: Yod Labs

inputs.name: ConnectionName
inputs.label: Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a previously registered service connection. Choose 'Manage' to register a new connection. (create a Credential Service Endpoint)

inputs.name: userNameVarName
inputs.label: Username variable name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the variable where username of the connection will be stored. If empty username will be ignored

inputs.name: passwordVarName
inputs.label: Password variable name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the variale where the password of the connection will be stored. If empty password will be ignored

instanceNameFormat: Set user to variable with name $(userNameVarName) and password to variable with name $(passwordVarName)
